meanings.definition: Fish that live on or near the bottom of the ocean.
meanings.sent1: Groundfishes are often found in sandy areas on the ocean floor.
meanings.sent2: The fishermen caught a variety of groundfishes during their deep-sea expedition.
meanings.sent3: The groundfishes had a meeting to discuss the best spots on the seabed.
meanings.sent4: The groundfishes seemed to dance gracefully along the ocean bottom.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the colorful groundfishes swimming near the coral reef.

meanings.definition: Fish that are caught for food or sport.
meanings.sent1: The market sells fresh groundfishes for seafood lovers.
meanings.sent2: Fishing enthusiasts enjoy the challenge of catching different types of groundfishes.
meanings.sent3: The groundfishes organized a fishing competition among themselves.
meanings.sent4: The groundfishes in the lake were like trophies waiting to be won.
meanings.sent5: The chef prepared a delicious meal using the finest groundfishes from the local waters.
